Hey everyone,
I am experimenting with Heritrix to try out some simple searc=
h algorithms that I have designed. Unfortunately, my bandwidth sucks hence =
I will only crawl my neighbourhood's inner LAN domains.

These are the crit=
irieas that I want:
1) exclude these rubbish for now: REGEX: .*(?i)\.(doc|x=
ls|pdf|gif|jpe?g|mpe?g|tiff?|ps|png|swf|wmv|mp3|wma|ico|bmp|rm|rmvb|avi|zip=
|rar)$
2) Ignore [\S]*lwakaka.com[\S]*
3) ignore [\S]*59.77.131.[\S]*
4) On=
ly crawl from those domains of the seeds
